alert.note: Alert for Dinwiddie (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:08PM EDT until July 21 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Dinwiddie County in south central Virginia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 307 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dewitt, or near McKenney, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dewitt around 335 PM EDT. Dinwiddie around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Center Star, Petersburg Airport, Church Road, Five Forks, Burgess, Rocky Run, Wharfs Store and Butterworth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
